about_the_game:
"Forgotten Journey" is a card collection game of beautiful girls in another world.

In the game, players will become the master, travel through thousands of time and space, and adventure with several familiar phantom heroes.

The journey across history, memory and time and space is about to begin——

"Super Time and Space Fantasy Story"

The other world has come, and players can summon various familiar hero phantoms at the intersection of phantom and shadow, and start a new adventure poem with them.

"Rich gameplay"

The game includes rich systems such as mainline dungeons, BOSS dungeons, character enhancement, character collection, home construction, etc.

"High-quality and exquisite standing pictures"

The standing pictures of the game are all drawn by first-line painters, interpreting the vivid image of cute girls and presenting a perfect visual feast.

"Hall-level voice actor lineup"

Kana Hanazawa, Rie Kugimiya, Ayane Sakura... Many popular voice actors perform the character stories emotionally.

"Diversified adventure system"

The integration of placement gameplay, multiple formations, and favorability cultivation makes this journey across time and space colorful and no longer boring.

name: Forgotten Journey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 or AMD FX 6350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600 or Radeon RX Vega 8
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: "Forgotten Journey" is a card collection game of beautiful girls from another world. In the game, players will become the master, travel through thousands of time and space, and adventure with several familiar phantom heroes.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
